title: Best Face Angle Detector
description: Developed a system to improve facial recognition accuracy by detecting optimal face angles, achieving a 15% improvement in accuracy.
achievements: Designed algorithms to analyze facial features, reducing error rate in angle detection by 20%.
Managed project stages and presented findings to stakeholders, achieving a 95% satisfaction rate.

title: Hindi Spell Checker Web Application
description: Created an accessible tool for accurate Hindi spell correction, enhancing user engagement by 40%.
achievements: Improved code efficiency by 30% through string manipulation and algorithms.
Deployed 3 web applications, reducing loading times by 15%.
Applied Levenshtein distance for spell correction, reducing error rates by 25%.
